features.title: 15 Features to
features.subtitle: From training agreements to billing, Certiwize automates your entire Qualiopi administrative process.
features.cta_subtitle: Join the training organizations saving time with Certiwize.
features.feature_1_desc: Automatically create Qualiopi-compliant training agreements from your CRM data. Each agreement is personalized with client, trainer, and training information. No more input errors and hours spent on Word.
features.feature_2_desc: Send your agreements for electronic signature and automatically sync signed documents in Airtable. Status is updated in real-time and documents are archived automatically.
features.feature_3_desc: Automatic creation of a Drive folder structure for each client with all necessary folders: agreements, attendance sheets, certifications, invoices. All your documents are organized and accessible at a glance.
features.feature_4_desc: Automatically generate training summons with all necessary information: dates, times, location, program. Summons are personalized for each learner and comply with Qualiopi requirements.
features.feature_5_desc: Automatic sending of positioning questionnaires before training begins. Responses are collected and analyzed automatically to adapt pedagogical content.
features.feature_6_desc: Automatically send summons by email to all learners with a personalized reminder. Emails are tracked to know who received and opened their summons.
features.feature_7_desc: Automatic generation of Qualiopi-compliant attendance sheets with the list of learners, schedules and dates. Digital attendance or PDF export for paper signature.
features.feature_8_desc: Automatic sending of hot satisfaction questionnaire at the end of training. Responses are collected and analyzed to continuously improve the quality of your training.
features.feature_9_desc: Automatically create your invoices from training data. Automatic amount calculation, sequential numbering and compliance with legal mentions. PDF export and integrated accounting.
features.feature_10_desc: Automatic follow-up system for learners who haven't completed the hot questionnaire. Maximize your response rate to get complete feedback.
features.feature_11_desc: Automatic creation of training certificates and attestations with your organization's logo, learner information and training details. Professional and compliant design.
features.feature_12_desc: Automatic sending of all necessary documents to the training manager or OPCO: signed agreement, attendance sheets, certificate, pedagogical report. Everything is centralized and sent in one click.
features.feature_13_desc: Automatic sending of certificates and attestations to each learner by email. Personalized message and secured document with QR code for authenticity verification.
features.feature_14_desc: Programming and automatic sending of cold questionnaire 3 to 6 months after training. Evaluate the real impact of training on skills and practical application.
features.feature_15_desc: Bidirectional synchronization with Pennylane for automated accounting. Your invoices, payments and accounting entries are synchronized in real-time.
